Body:
s = spectrographs.keck_lris.KeckLRISBSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'keck_lris_blue', 'long_400_3400_d560', 'LB.20160109.14149.fits.gz')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for Keck LRIS blue read.'
det = 2
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (2048, 1154)
assert bpm.shape == (2048, 1024)
dev_suite_required
